Name: Eden's Lair
About the game: Use a variety of techniques to vanquish your foes inside a series of unforgiving combat arenas. * Long and short ranged attacks. * 4 Unique special abilities. * Challenges and new abilities unlocked after beating the main game. * Unique enemy types. * Upgrade your abilities as you progress through the main game.
